text: Stadium:MK is a football stadium in Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire. The Milton Keynes Dons F.C. football club has played there since it opened in July 2007. Queen Elizabeth II officially opened the stadium on 3rd December 2007. As of 2018, there were about 31,000 seats in the stadium. The stadium is beside the junction of the A5 road with the A421 road. Category:Football stadiums in England Category:2007 establishments in England Category:Buildings and structures in Buckinghamshire
title: Stadium MK
